Iranian Enrichment Monitoring Act of 2023
A bill to modify the Iran Nuclear Weapons Capability and Terrorism Monitoring Act of 2022.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Select Committee on Intelligence.

bill.summary:
Iranian Enrichment Monitoring Act of 2023
This bill specifies that the Office of the Director of National Intelligence (ODNI) must notify Congress within 48 hours of determining that Iran has produced or possesses any amount of uranium-235 enriched to more than 60% purity. Subsequent to such notification, ODNI must also notify Congress within 48 hours if Iran has engaged in significant enrichment activity (such as enriching more than 10 kilograms of uranium-235).
